song.title: Secret society
song.info:
Coming from Atari/Amiga DemoScene (1988-1996) mainly coding demo in assembly code with Devpack ;-) I have restart demoscene some years ago with my first 3D engine based on DirectX 9 (started in 2010). and release the Project 2401 at Evoke 2014. Of course with family/children/work that's not easy to work full time on it ;-)
At the begining of this year, i have found Cinder Framework and ShaderToy.com website, with a lot of great shader effect remember me old school demo coding on my Amiga in asm :-p
And that's it.. first little demo with this new great tools... Of course that's not the greatest/smallest/Brillant demo like Cocoon/Mercury/Fairlight but just for me some way to make dreams and make some "artistic expression"...
Difficult to explain on all people around me that you can make Computer Art as Developper...
Personal Greetz flying to : Mike, Autopsy, JMZ, JoSsS, IQ, Frafra, Renaud, Phil & some other people i have meet during these years...
Enjoy & CU for a next Release...
